name: com.experir.exicon
description: Browse, search, and download SVG icons from popular open-source icon libraries directly into your Unity project. Optionally convert to PNG sprites and recolor icons to match your theme. This asset references Lucide (ISC), Tabler Icons, Heroicons, Bootstrap Icons, Feather Icons, Ionicons, Phosphor Icons, Octicons, and Iconoir (all MIT); see Third-Party Notices.txt file in package for details.
